item.description: We invite you to join us in watching a movie with consciousness and sharing in meaningful conversation. This will be a fantastic opportunity to discuss spiritually relevant topics in a setting dedicated to consciousness. This month's movie is 'Mother Theresa', an inspiring film about a deeply spiritual woman who made a powerful impact on the world. We hope you will join us. Popcorn will be provided!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Conscious Movie Night: Mother Theresa
